name: LikeRogue
description:
Get ready to survive in a mysterious forest in roguelike style. Forest is getting overrun and your dude is all alone at his home. So, out to the forest to find items and improvements to those to be able to play as long as you can. Playing is fairly simple but can be hard.

I made this myself for roguelike game jam that lasted for a month.

Controls:

  • e: Inventory
  • r: Equipments
  • Space: Wait a turn
  • W/A/S/D: Move camera
  • Mouse Left/Right: Interact. Game windows explains more
